alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 11:18PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ..Strong Southwest Winds Tonight... This is a special, maybe not that special, weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHERE...Natrona County, and the Green and Rattlesnake Ranges. * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph. Localized higher gusts up to 65 mph are possible in wind prone areas, such as along Wyoming Boulevard on the south side of Casper, and on ridges in the Green and Rattlesnake Ranges. * WHEN...Tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mainly to transportation. Expect control issues with light and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
